roleset.name: giving, often in answer to a request

roles.note: Watch out for non-events. If you can't replace 'grant' with 'granting' without changing the meaning, it's probaly not an event.

example.name: Not eventive. Call it .YY!
example.text: This coming from someone that footed their own college tuition , No mommy and daddy allowences , no grants or anything else .
example.note: This is definitely referring to the money itself.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WN sense #2, #3, grant-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls future_having-13.3.

example.name: All args
example.text: Mr. Weeding suggested whether it would not save time and trouble, to limit the motion to the production of such papers as came to hand aftert their grant of £60,000 to the Noble Marquess.
example.note: Some usages like this are really ambiguous as to whether they are refering to the granting, or to the monetary gift itself. Do your best to select eventive usages and mark non-events as .YY.
